title: v1.0.0
items: Modified banking logic, will use deposit all button and if you had a woodbox in your inventory, will rewithdraw it.
Fixed menaphos VIP area banking + getting stuck

title: v1.0.0
items: Added stats tab to UI: Runtime, logs chopped, logs/hr, xp gained, xp/hr, levels gained, TTL
Uses any woodbox and correctly calculates its capacity, no trying to fill when full.
Added support for picking up bird nests (and banking them if not using woodbox)
Crystallize, light form support added. Use light form with upgraded GOTE.
Fort Forinthry Grove support added (tree stump detection a little buggy, use at your own risk)
Fixed a bug in banking logic that would cause some not to work, such as deposit boxes in menaphos

title: v1.0.0
items: fixed an issue with regular trees in draynor being chopped too far from bank
